Scripture Memory Tools

Verse Flash

Use this tool to assist in memorizing a new passage. After you search for a passage, only the first letter of each word will be displayed. Hover over each letter to reveal the rest of the corresponding word as you mentally recite the passage.


Verse Flash - Custom Text

To utilize the above tool on a custom text, such as a translation not available above or a non-biblical text, input your desired text below. Consider using this tool in conjunction with the Verse Vault.

Memory Drill

After searching for a passage above, use this tool to drill the passage further! Click "Next" (or the right arrow key) to reveal the next word in the passage. Click "Back" (or the left arrow key) to hide the last word. Click "Reset" (or the R key) to start over. (If you input a new custom text, please reset first before using this tool.)
